description: Test your basic understanding of the C programming language.

questions.question: Who is the creator of the C programming language?
Which header file is used for input and output functions in C?
Which symbol is used to start a single-line comment in C?
What is the correct format specifier for an integer in C?
Which function is used to read a single character from the user?
Which keyword is used to declare a constant in C?
What will be the output of: printf("%d", 5 + 2 * 3); ?
Which of the following is not a valid data type in C?
Which looping statement is guaranteed to execute at least once?
Which function is used to find the length of a string in C?
